name: Speedwagon Foundation HQ
footer: The Speedwagon Foundation... A mysterious organization which has deceived the world into believing that it is just a philanthropic organization.

name: Brooklyn Art Museum
description: Whenever a Speedwagon Foundation card is summoned, draw a card
footer: You know BB... I think this is the place! The homely feeling and beautiful displays... I'll take it!

name: JoJo Media Corporation Building
description: Every turn, transform me into a random location.
footer: What is this place?!?!? One second I am in a recording studio and now I am in an children's daycare?!?! I need to find my kids!

name: 5 Horsemen HQ
description: Whenever you summon a 5 Horsemen card, give it +2 attack and +2 health.
footer: The 5 Horsemen. A budding new organization whose goals are unknown to the world. Who knows what they are planning next!

name: Willie's Pizzas and Gyros
description: Whenever you play a 'Soul Dish'. Generate another random 2 cost 'Soul Dish' in your hand.
footer: Hey gurls! I found this pizza place we can go to! It's called Willie's Pizzas and Gyros! I heard that their food can give an out of world experience!

generatedCards.name: *Hey Baby!* Margherita Flatbread
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +1 attack and +2 health.

generatedCards.name: *Yes I am* Greek Salad *with* Lettuce
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +2 attack and +1 health.

generatedCards.name: *Kono* Greek Chicken Gyros with Tzatziki *Da!*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to 3 allies in your deck to give them +2 attack and +2 health.

generatedCards.name: *Oh? You're approaching this* Lasagna? *Instead of running away, you're coming right to this Lasagna?*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +3 attack

generatedCards.name: *I can't beat the shit out of this Penne Pasta without getting closer*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +3 health.

generatedCards.name: Calamari *OVERDRIVE!*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to reduce their cost by 3.

generatedCards.name: Lesson 1: If you have the Tiramisu, then do it
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +4 attack.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 2: Work those* Galaktoboureko (custard in filo)
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +4 health.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 3: Believe in the* Kourabiedes (butter cookies)
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +1 attack and +3 health.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 4: Pay your respects. Spin your* Gelato *in the golden ratio.*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +3 attack and +1 health.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 5: The shortest route is the* Halva (nut butter sweets). *It was the* Halva (nut butter sweets) *that was our shortest path*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Ice Cream Store
description: Whenever you summon a 5 Horsemen card, reveal an enemy card and increase its cost by 1.
footer: Just a normal Ice Cream Store they said...

name: Space
description: When I am summoned, give both players a 1 cost 'Dionte' and destroy me instantly.

generatedCharacters.name: Dionte Brando
generatedCharacters.description: When I am summoned, Destroy the enemy deck.
generatedCharacters.footer: Time for the 50th reincarnation... Let's have some fun with it.

footer: Leave it to the endless expanse to destroy endlessness itself.

name: Meth Lab
footer: Children are cheap and easy to make. They're also the perfect shields!

name: Buddy's Apartment
description: Round Start and on Summon: Silence the enemy who is in the same position as me.
footer: Buddy's apartment is a place where you can find a lot of things. But you can't find a lot of things in Buddy's apartment.

name: Sunset Drive: Apartment 444
description: Round Start: Add a 0 cost Deluded 'Hellish Training' to your hand.
footer: Mom, please have mercy on Rep. He may have missed a couple... days... or weeks... or months... but still!

generatedCards.name: Hellish Training
generatedCards.description: **Deluded** Deal 1 damage to an ally card to give them +2 attack.

name: The Pendant
description: When I am summoned, capture an ally card to fully heal them. Round Start: Destroy me.
footer: Oh... Hello there. The name is Jordy. Jordy Jones
